title: Max Verstappen pounds out dominant victory at Italian F1 Grand Prix
summary: Max Verstappen clinched victory at the Italian F1 Grand Prix, leading Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri in a strong performance. Lewis Hamilton, making his Ferrari debut, secured a sixth-place finish at Monza. The race showcased Verstappen's dominance in the season.

title: England set South Africa target of 415 to win third men’s one-day international – live
summary: South Africa has secured victory in the three-match ODI series against England. The teams are set to face off at the Utilita Bowl, where England will aim to salvage some pride. James Wallace will be covering the match.

title: France v South Africa: Women’s Rugby World Cup – live
summary: France and South Africa have advanced to the quarter-finals of the tournament. The competition now focuses on determining which team will secure the top position in Pool D. Join Daniel Gallan for more insights on this exciting matchup.

title: Carlo Acutis, ‘God’s influencer’ who died age 15, declared a saint by Pope Leo
summary: A London-born Italian, who passed away in 2006, was recognized for creating websites aimed at promoting Catholic teachings. He is credited with two miracles, contributing to his legacy in the Church. His work continues to inspire many in the faith community.

title: Minns’s $140m great koala national park will ‘obliterate’ regional towns, Coalition claims
summary: The Coalition criticizes Labor's koala conservation strategy, claiming it lacks sufficient measures. In contrast, environmentalists celebrate the establishment of a new park, calling it a "once-in-a-lifetime" decision for koala protection. The differing views highlight the ongoing debate over environmental policies and their effectiveness.
